name: Pony on the Run
description:
Help the playful pony find the carrots while avoiding cowboys.

Fool the cowboys by taking U-turns and by using the bridge.

Use either the arrows keys or swipe with touch/mouse. Left/right changes track. Up/down changes speed between trot, gallop and tarsus.

Each level will be harder. On level twelve, no less than seven cowboys will be chasing you. Are you the one who can guide the pony right?!
